markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 25"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cube of Nex](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1805)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="Artifact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=253" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 305</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The _Cube of Nex_ acts as a _[Lesser Cube of Nex](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1804)_ except it suppresses all magic within 5 feet of it with the effects of a 10th-level [_antimagic field_](/Spells.aspx?ID=14) spell, instead of just one school. However, spells you cast and magic items you wield ignore the antimagic field from the _Cube of Nex_.

<document level="2" id="action-1465" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Cube of Nex
